name: Saolin's Neopets Theme - 21st Century Edition
description:
IN DEVELOPMENT - Nothing appears broken, but no guarantees

Thank you to all who have used my theme over the years and to those who have modified it for their own uses. Inspired by what I saw in some of those modifications, I set out to make this theme even better than it was before. While some styles were inspired by these modifications, all code is 100% my own. Since I have learned a lot more about CSS selectors over the years, this theme is only going to get better with time.

Please mail all bugs to me! Otherwise only pages I frequent will actually get done.
additional_info: V 0.01 – Initial release V 0.02 – Fixed #main location for Windows. Styled Neoboards topic pages. V 0.03 – Styled homepage, SDB. V 0.04 – Styled closet, added dailies script compatibility. V 1.0 – released 14 July 2017 - NOW WITH CHANGEABLE COLORS!! See top lines of code for variables to change. - The Neofriends online section is back, so I styled it! - Beautified a few more things. - Code is now fully readable and commented. - Also removed Photobucket dependency. V 1.1 – released 20 February 2018 - Now with universal text box, button, and dropdown styling. - Styled the Usershop and Neomail pages. - Streamlined the code a ton, but nothing that affects you. V 1.2 – released 10 December 2018 - Styled the Trading Post, Auctions, Quickstock pages. - Attempted to fix the Games pages (they're beyond help.) - Fixed some weird spacing because of ads.
